News.Title: Globe Textiles (India) Approves Split with Morabia Creation
News.Summary: Globe Textiles (India) has received approval for a split with Morabia Creation. No further details about the nature of the split or its implications are provided in the given news snippet.

News.Title: Globe Textiles (India) Limited: Q3 Profit Surges 54%, Revenue Up 46%
News.Summary: Globe Textiles reported a 53.7% increase in Q3 net profit to ₹291.42 lakhs. Revenue grew 46.2% to ₹15,159.21 lakhs. Nine-month revenue up 20.8%, net profit rose 56.6%. Recently completed oversubscribed rights issue of ₹4,504 lakhs for expansion and R&D. Plans to expand Growing Nevo division and focus on technology transfer.
